title: Long-term outcomes of 1–2 cm rectal neuroendocrine tumors after local excision or radical resection: A population-based multicenter study
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Chengguo Li, Minhao Yu, Weizhen Liu, Wei Zhang, Weizhong Jiang, Peng Zhang, Xinyu Zeng, Maojun Di, Xiaofeng Liao, Yongbin Zheng, Zhiguo Xiong, Lijian Xia, Yueming Sun, Rui Zhang, Ming Zhong, Guole Lin, Rong Lin, Kaixiong Tao
